General.Name: Kodi-S Co Ltd
General.Description: KODI CO., LTD engages in cosmetics, cosmetic containers, and displays manufacturing businesses in South Korea. It offers cosmetics, such as skin care, nail, base, eye, and lip products. The company was formerly known as KODI-S Co., Ltd. and changed its name to KODI CO., LTD in September 2016. KODI CO., LTD was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
